#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
int main() 
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d", &t);
 	long double Ans;
 
 	while(t--)
 	{
 		int n,i;
 		Ans=0.0;
 
 		scanf("%d", &n);
 
 
 
 		for(i=1; i<=n; i++)
 		{
 			Ans += (long double)(1.00/(long double)i);
 		}
 		
 		printf("%.3Lf\n",Ans);
 	}
 
	return 0;
}
